title: AD falls, PL and output fall in recession

content.question: If a change in aggregate demand results in a recession, the price level and real output will change in which of the following ways in the short run?

choices.label: Price Level Real Output No change Increase
Price Level Real Output Increase No change
Price Level Real Output Increase Decrease
Price Level Real Output Decrease No change
Price Level Real Output Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Price Level Real Output Decrease Decrease

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
